info.title: Enkrypt Secure MCP Gateway API
info.description: REST API for managing MCP configurations, projects, users, and system operations

tags.name: Health
tags.description: Health check endpoints for monitoring service availability

tags.name: Configurations
tags.description: MCP configuration management - create, read, update, delete configurations

tags.name: Servers
tags.description: Server management within configurations - add, update, delete MCP servers

tags.name: Guardrails
tags.description: Security guardrails - manage input and output policies for servers

tags.name: Projects
tags.description: Project management - create, read, update, delete projects and manage project users

tags.name: Users
tags.description: User management - create, read, update, delete users and manage user projects

tags.name: API Keys
tags.description: API key management - generate, rotate, enable, disable, and delete API keys

tags.name: Search
tags.description: Search operations across configurations, projects, and users

tags.name: Import/Export
tags.description: Import and export operations for configurations and projects

tags.name: System
tags.description: System operations - health checks, backup, restore, and reset

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected server error

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected server error

get.description: List projects using a specific configuration.
List servers in a specific configuration.

post.description: Add a server to a configuration.

delete.summary: Delete All Servers From Config Endpoint
delete.description: Remove all servers from a configuration.

get.description: Get specific server details from a configuration.

put.description: Update a server in a configuration.

delete.description: Remove a server from a configuration.

post.description: Search MCP configurations by name or other configuration metadata. Returns all matching configurations.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Server encountered an error

put.description: Update server guardrails policies (both input and output).

post.description: Assign a configuration to a project.

get.description: Get configuration assigned to a project.

post.description: Add a user to a project.

delete.summary: Remove All Users From Project Endpoint
delete.description: Remove all users from a project.
Remove a user from a project.

post.description: Export a project and its associated MCP configuration to a JSON file. The export includes project metadata, users, and the complete MCP configuration with all servers.

404.description: Not Found - Project does not exist

500.description: Internal Server Error - Server encountered an error

post.description: Search projects by name or other project metadata. Returns all matching projects.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Server encountered an error

get.description: List projects for a specific user.

post.description: Generate an API key for a user.

get.description: List API keys for a user.

delete.summary: Delete All User Api Keys Endpoint
delete.description: Delete all API keys for a user.

get.description: List all API keys across all users.

post.description: Rotate an existing API key. Generates a new API key to replace the old one while maintaining the same user and project associations.

404.description: Not Found - API key does not exist

500.description: Internal Server Error - Server encountered an error

post.description: Search users by email or other user metadata. Returns all matching users.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Server encountered an error

api_key.title: Api Key
api_key.description: The API key to rotate (will be replaced with a new key)

output_file.title: Output File
output_file.description: Full path where the project export file will be saved
